channel.title: Updating the convolution filter
channel.description: I made a patch like the granular convolver. It uses the graintable object to feed the convolution table. I have a dial controlling the position of the grain table and as I turn it the change speed object turns on the recording of the convolution table. grainconv.axp (6.3 KB) This does result in an initial clicking when the change is happening. I was wondering if anyone had any ideas how I could make the change of sample smoother?
